definitions.definition: A game played on a lawn , in which players use mallets to drive balls through hoops ( wickets ).
A shot in this game in which the striker's ball and another ball are moved by hitting the striker's ball when they have been placed in contact following a roquet .

main_definition: ( uncountable , games ) A game played on a lawn , in which players use mallets to drive balls through hoops ( wickets ).
secondary_definitions: ( countable , games ) A shot in this game in which the striker's ball and another ball are moved by hitting the striker's ball when they have been placed in contact following a roquet .
